A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Acting like a rebellious teenager\, spends too much effort  willfully undermining it's predecessor. Avengers-lite humour that doesn't hit the mark\, pointless filler sub-plots\, disappointing character arcs\, unfulfilling answers for some important questions\, and overall a real loss of the sense of grandeur and mythos that I associated with 'Star Wars'. \nWe have lost some of the characters that are enshrined within the story\, yet have kept a number that don't feel like they belong and in fact struggled to find anything to do in this film.\nDisappointing.
